text: Needless to say,we're all shocked and saddened...
title: Green Lantern

text: ...by the news of Ardakian Trawl.

text: She was a bold and gallantGreen Lantern...
title: Green Lantern

text: ...whose achievementswill long be remembered.

text: But for now, we must set asideour mourning for the threat at hand.

text: Glad you could make it.

text: Sorry.

text: We know from her ring that Ardakian'smurderers were Shadow Demons.
title: Green Lantern

text: Soulless creaturesfrom the Antimatter Universe.
title: Green Lantern

text: We haven't seen themsince the great crisis.
title: Green Lantern

text: They came from a rift in our sun, a riftthat connected directly to their universe.
title: Green Lantern

text: We take it this was no mere anomaly.
title: Green Lantern

text: No. We were able to makea detailed analysis through the ring.
title: Green Lantern

text: There's no mistake.
title: Green Lantern

text: The demons were sent by Krona.
title: Green Lantern

text: Most of you know Krona's story...
title: Green Lantern

text: ...how he defied authority...
title: Green Lantern

text: ...and created the Antimatter Universebillions of years ago.
title: Green Lantern

text: He nearly annihilated all of creation.
title: Green Lantern

text: As punishment he was turnedinto disembodied energy...
title: Green Lantern

text: ...and cast throughout the cosmos.
title: Green Lantern

text: We thought him gone...
title: Green Lantern

text: ...but it seems he has reconstituted himselfin the Antimatter realm...
title: Green Lantern

text: ...bringing the Shadow Demonsunder his control.
title: Green Lantern

text: We sense this is just the beginning...
title: Green Lantern

text: ...that Krona means to use our sun,the very center of the universe...
title: Green Lantern

text: ...as a portal to attack us.
title: Green Lantern

text: We have sent a squadron of Lanternsto the sun to begin monitoring.
title: Green Lantern

text: They'll be setting up observation platformsto conserve energy.
title: Green Lantern

text: Meanwhile, all important documentsand artifacts will be moved from Oa...
title: Green Lantern

text: ...to the Broome-Kane star clusterfor safekeeping.
title: Green Lantern

text: We'll need everyone to keep a close watchon the sun while we evacuate.

text: We have already removed the Book of Oa,our most sacred text.
